text: Beauty can't amuse you, but brainwork - reading, writing, thinking - can.
author: Helen Gurley Brown

text: Wigs have always been a part of my life and have become a staple accessory in my closet. I can remember being a little girl and hearing all the commotion in my house from my mom, aunts and grandmother when picking out their wigs for the day. It was such a good time for them and part of their everyday beauty routine.
author: Sherri Shepherd

text: I think we should all be tolerant of each other and embrace each others' strengths and differences and uniqueness and beauty.
author: Martina McBride

text: I have girls who are concerned about how they look compared to models or what have you. It's my responsibility to teach them that beauty is more than superficial.
author: Martina McBride

text: The beauty about the D-list is that people who are on it probably don't know they are.
author: Kathy Griffin
